## üñ•Ô∏è System Requirements

| Component | Minimum | Recommended |
|-----------|---------|-------------|
| CPU | 4 vCPU | 8 vCPU |
| RAM | 8 GB | 16 GB |
| Storage | 200 GB SSD | 500 GB NVMe |
| OS | Ubuntu 20.04 | Ubuntu 22.04 |
| Bandwidth | 100 Mbps | 1 Gbps |

## üîß Variables

**IMPORTANT:** Replace these variables with your own values before installation:

```bash
# Enter your own values
export MONIKER="YOUR_NODE_NAME"        # Your node name
export PORT_PREFIX="53"                 # Your desired port prefix (10-65)
export WALLET_NAME="wallet"            # Wallet name
```

## üöÄ Installation

### 1Ô∏è‚É£ System Update and Required Packages

```bash
# Go to home directory
cd $HOME

# System update
sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y
sudo apt install -y curl git wget htop tmux build-essential jq make lz4 gcc unzip
```

### 2Ô∏è‚É£ Go 1.23.9 Installation

**IMPORTANT:** Safrochain requires Go 1.23.9!

```bash
cd $HOME
sudo rm -rf /usr/local/go
wget "https://golang.org/dl/go1.23.9.linux-amd64.tar.gz"
sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf "go1.23.9.linux-amd64.tar.gz"
rm "go1.23.9.linux-amd64.tar.gz"

# Go PATH settings
echo 'export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin:$HOME/go/bin' >> ~/.bash_profile
source ~/.bash_profile

# Version check
go version
# Expected output: go version go1.23.9 linux/amd64
```

### 3Ô∏è‚É£ Save Variables

```bash
# Make variables permanent
echo "export MONIKER=\"$MONIKER\"" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
echo "export WALLET_NAME=\"$WALLET_NAME\"" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
echo "export PORT_PREFIX=\"$PORT_PREFIX\"" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
echo "export SAFROCHAIN_PORT=\"${PORT_PREFIX}\"" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
source $HOME/.bash_profile

# Check
echo "Moniker: $MONIKER"
echo "Port Prefix: $PORT_PREFIX"
echo "Wallet: $WALLET_NAME"
```

### 4Ô∏è‚É£ Binary Installation

```bash
# Make sure you are in the home directory
cd $HOME

# Clean existing folder
rm -rf safrochain-node

# Clone repository
git clone https://github.com/Safrochain-Org/safrochain-node.git
cd safrochain-node
git checkout v0.1.0

# Compile (Will work directly with Go 1.23.9)
make install

# NOTE: "cp: cannot stat '/safrochaind'" error is negligible, ignore it
# This is a minor bug in the Makefile but the binary compiles successfully

# Binary check
ls -la ~/go/bin/safrochaind
# Binary should be visible: -rwxr-xr-x 1 root root 162249280 ... /root/go/bin/safrochaind
```

### 5Ô∏è‚É£ libwasmvm v2.0.1 Installation (CRITICAL!)

**IMPORTANT:** 
- Safrochain ONLY tested and works with libwasmvm v2.0.1
- v2.2.4, v1.x or other versions DEFINITELY DO NOT WORK!
- You must install libwasmvm in the safrochain-node/lib directory (Cosmovisor will look at this location)

```bash
# Go to Safrochain directory
cd ~/safrochain-node

# Create lib directory
mkdir -p lib
cd lib

# Download libwasmvm v2.0.1 (ONLY TESTED AND WORKING VERSION!)
wget https://github.com/CosmWasm/wasmvm/releases/download/v2.0.1/libwasmvm.x86_64.so -O libwasmvm.so
chmod +x libwasmvm.so

# Test
cd ~/safrochain-node
LD_LIBRARY_PATH=./lib ~/go/bin/safrochaind version

# Expected output: v0.1.0
# This output MUST appear, otherwise don't continue!
```

### 6Ô∏è‚É£ Cosmovisor Installation

```bash
# Install Cosmovisor
go install cosmossdk.io/tools/cosmovisor/cmd/cosmovisor@latest

# Create directory structure
mkdir -p $HOME/.safrochain/cosmovisor/genesis/bin
mkdir -p $HOME/.safrochain/cosmovisor/upgrades

# Copy libwasmvm to Cosmovisor directory (as backup)
cp $HOME/safrochain-node/lib/libwasmvm.so $HOME/.safrochain/cosmovisor/genesis/bin/

# Create symlink
sudo ln -s $HOME/.safrochain/cosmovisor/genesis $HOME/.safrochain/cosmovisor/current -f
```

### 7Ô∏è‚É£ Wrapper Script for Cosmovisor (MANDATORY!)

**CRITICAL:** 
- Wrapper script is ESSENTIAL for Cosmovisor to find libwasmvm!
- DO NOT use `exec` or `export` in wrapper script! (Critical, otherwise it won't work)
- Only use `cd` and direct `LD_LIBRARY_PATH`

```bash
# CREATE WRAPPER SCRIPT (with name safrochaind)
cat > $HOME/.safrochain/cosmovisor/genesis/bin/safrochaind << 'EOF'
#!/bin/bash
cd /root/safrochain-node
LD_LIBRARY_PATH=./lib /root/go/bin/safrochaind "$@"
EOF

# Make executable
chmod +x $HOME/.safrochain/cosmovisor/genesis/bin/safrochaind

# Test
$HOME/.safrochain/cosmovisor/genesis/bin/safrochaind version
# Expected output: v0.1.0

# If v0.1.0 doesn't appear, there's a problem with the wrapper script!
```

### 8Ô∏è‚É£ Node Initialization and Configuration

```bash
# Initialize (with wrapper)
$HOME/.safrochain/cosmovisor/genesis/bin/safrochaind init "$MONIKER" --chain-id safro-testnet-1

# Manually create client.toml (config commands don't work)
mkdir -p $HOME/.safrochain/config

cat > $HOME/.safrochain/config/client.toml << EOF
chain-id = "safro-testnet-1"
keyring-backend = "file"
output = "text"
node = "tcp://localhost:${PORT_PREFIX}657"
broadcast-mode = "sync"
EOF
```

### 9Ô∏è‚É£ Port Configuration

```bash
# config.toml port settings
sed -i -e "s%^proxy_app = \"tcp://127.0.0.1:26658\"%proxy_app = \"tcp://127.0.0.1:${PORT_PREFIX}658\"%; s%^laddr = \"tcp://127.0.0.1:26657\"%laddr = \"tcp://127.0.0.1:${PORT_PREFIX}657\"%; s%^pprof_laddr = \"localhost:6060\"%pprof_laddr = \"localhost:${PORT_PREFIX}060\"%; s%^laddr = \"tcp://0.0.0.0:26656\"%laddr = \"tcp://0.0.0.0:${PORT_PREFIX}656\"%; s%^prometheus_listen_addr = \":26660\"%prometheus_listen_addr = \":${PORT_PREFIX}660\"%" $HOME/.safrochain/config/config.toml

# app.toml port settings
sed -i -e "s%^address = \"tcp://localhost:1317\"%address = \"tcp://localhost:${PORT_PREFIX}317\"%; s%^address = \":8080\"%address = \":${PORT_PREFIX}080\"%; s%^address = \"localhost:9090\"%address = \"localhost:${PORT_PREFIX}090\"%; s%^address = \"localhost:9091\"%address = \"localhost:${PORT_PREFIX}091\"%" $HOME/.safrochain/config/app.toml
```

### üîü Genesis and Addrbook

```bash
# Genesis file
wget -O $HOME/.safrochain/config/genesis.json https://vault2.astrostake.xyz/testnet/safrochain/genesis.json

# Genesis check
if [ -f "$HOME/.safrochain/config/genesis.json" ]; then
    echo "‚úÖ Genesis file downloaded"
    sha256sum $HOME/.safrochain/config/genesis.json
else
    echo "‚ùå Genesis file could not be downloaded!"
    exit 1
fi

# Addrbook
wget -O $HOME/.safrochain/config/addrbook.json https://vault2.astrostake.xyz/testnet/safrochain/addrbook.json
```

### 1Ô∏è‚É£1Ô∏è‚É£ Seeds and Peers Settings

```bash
# Seeds
SEEDS="2242a526e7841e7e8a551aabc4614e6cd612e7fb@88.99.211.113:26656"
sed -i -e "s/^seeds *=.*/seeds = \"$SEEDS\"/" $HOME/.safrochain/config/config.toml

# Minimum gas price
sed -i -e "s/^minimum-gas-prices *=.*/minimum-gas-prices = \"0.001usaf\"/" $HOME/.safrochain/config/app.toml

# Pruning settings (optional - for disk savings)
sed -i -e "s/^pruning *=.*/pruning = \"custom\"/" $HOME/.safrochain/config/app.toml
sed -i -e "s/^pruning-keep-recent *=.*/pruning-keep-recent = \"100\"/" $HOME/.safrochain/config/app.toml
sed -i -e "s/^pruning-interval *=.*/pruning-interval = \"10\"/" $HOME/.safrochain/config/app.toml
```

## üéÆ Service Management

### Creating Systemd Service (with Cosmovisor)

```bash
# Create Cosmovisor service
sudo tee /etc/systemd/system/safrochaind.service > /dev/null <<EOF
[Unit]
Description=Safrochain Cosmovisor Node
After=network-online.target

[Service]
User=root
ExecStart=/root/go/bin/cosmovisor run start
Restart=on-failure
RestartSec=10
LimitNOFILE=65535
Environment="DAEMON_HOME=/root/.safrochain"
Environment="DAEMON_NAME=safrochaind"
Environment="DAEMON_RESTART_AFTER_UPGRADE=true"
Environment="DAEMON_ALLOW_DOWNLOAD_BINARIES=false"
Environment="UNSAFE_SKIP_BACKUP=true"

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF
```

### Starting the Service

```bash
# Enable and start service
sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo systemctl enable safrochaind
sudo systemctl start safrochaind

# Check status
sudo systemctl status safrochaind

# Watch logs
journalctl -fu safrochaind -o cat

# NOTE: You may get "port already in use" error at first
# Service will start working after a few restarts
```

## üöÄ Fast Sync (Snapshot)

You can use snapshot to speed up sync process:

### Snapshot Download and Installation

```bash
# 1. Install lz4
sudo apt update
sudo apt-get install snapd lz4 -y

# 2. Stop service and backup state
sudo systemctl stop safrochaind
cp $HOME/.safrochain/data/priv_validator_state.json $HOME/.safrochain/priv_validator_state.json.backup

# 3. Clean old data
rm -rf $HOME/.safrochain/data
safrochaind tendermint unsafe-reset-all --home ~/.safrochain/ --keep-addr-book

# 4. Download snapshot (NodeStake snapshot - updated every 12 hours)
SNAP_NAME=$(curl -s https://ss-t.safrochain.nodestake.org/ | egrep -o ">20.*\.tar.lz4" | tr -d ">")
curl -o - -L https://ss-t.safrochain.nodestake.org/${SNAP_NAME} | lz4 -c -d - | tar -x -C $HOME/.safrochain

# 5. Restore validator state
mv $HOME/.safrochain/priv_validator_state.json.backup $HOME/.safrochain/data/priv_validator_state.json

# 6. Start service
sudo systemctl restart safrochaind

# 7. Check logs
sudo journalctl -fu safrochaind -o cat
```

**NOTE:** Snapshot is updated every 12 hours. If snapshot download fails, you can continue with normal sync.

## üë§ Validator Operations

### Wallet Creation

```bash
# Using alias (if installed)
safrochaind keys add $WALLET_NAME

# Or manually
cd ~/safrochain-node
LD_LIBRARY_PATH=./lib ~/go/bin/safrochaind keys add $WALLET_NAME

# KEEP YOUR SEED PHRASE IN A SAFE PLACE!
```

### Wallet Recovery

```bash
# Recover existing wallet with seed phrase
safrochaind keys add $WALLET_NAME --recover
```

### Balance Check

```bash
# Get your address
safrochaind keys show $WALLET_NAME -a

# Check balance
safrochaind query bank balances $(safrochaind keys show $WALLET_NAME -a)
```

### Creating Validator

**IMPORTANT:** Make sure you are synced and have enough tokens!

```bash
# 1. Check sync status
safrochaind status 2>&1 | jq .sync_info.catching_up
# Should be false

# 2. Get validator public key
VAL_PUBKEY=$(safrochaind tendermint show-validator)

# 3. Create validator config file
cat <<EOF > /root/.safrochain/validator.json
{
  "pubkey": $VAL_PUBKEY,
  "amount": "1000000usaf",
  "moniker": "$MONIKER",
  "identity": "",
  "website": "",
  "security": "",
  "details": "Safrochain Validator",
  "commission-rate": "0.10",
  "commission-max-rate": "0.20",
  "commission-max-change-rate": "0.01",
  "min-self-delegation": "1"
}
EOF

# 4. Create validator
safrochaind tx staking create-validator /root/.safrochain/validator.json \
  --from=$WALLET_NAME \
  --chain-id=safro-testnet-1 \
  --gas=auto \
  --gas-adjustment=1.4 \
  --fees=300usaf \
  --home ~/.safrochain \
  -y
```

### Edit Validator

```bash
safrochaind tx staking edit-validator \
--moniker "$MONIKER" \
--identity "<keybase_id>" \
--website "<website>" \
--security-contact "<email>" \
--details "<description>" \
--commission-rate "0.10" \
--chain-id safro-testnet-1 \
--gas-prices 0.0001usaf \
--gas-adjustment 1.5 \
--gas auto \
--from $WALLET_NAME \
-y
```

### Delegate Tokens

```bash
# Delegate to your own validator
safrochaind tx staking delegate $(safrochaind keys show $WALLET_NAME --bech val -a) 1000000usaf \
--chain-id safro-testnet-1 \
--gas-prices 0.0001usaf \
--gas-adjustment 1.5 \
--gas auto \
--from $WALLET_NAME \
-y
```

### Withdraw Rewards

```bash
# Delegator rewards
safrochaind tx distribution withdraw-rewards $(safrochaind keys show $WALLET_NAME --bech val -a) \
--chain-id safro-testnet-1 \
--gas-prices 0.0001usaf \
--gas-adjustment 1.5 \
--gas auto \
--from $WALLET_NAME \
-y

# With validator commission
safrochaind tx distribution withdraw-rewards $(safrochaind keys show $WALLET_NAME --bech val -a) --commission \
--chain-id safro-testnet-1 \
--gas-prices 0.0001usaf \
--gas-adjustment 1.5 \
--gas auto \
--from $WALLET_NAME \
-y
```

### Send Tokens

```bash
safrochaind tx bank send $(safrochaind keys show $WALLET_NAME -a) <receiver_address> 1000000usaf \
--chain-id safro-testnet-1 \
--gas-prices 0.0001usaf \
--gas-adjustment 1.5 \
--gas auto \
-y
```

## üìä Node Status and Information

### Sync Status Check Script

You can use this script to continuously monitor sync status:

```bash
# Create sync check script
cat > ~/safro_sync_check.sh << 'EOF'
#!/bin/bash
# Safrochain Sync Status Checker

# Get RPC port from config
rpc_port=$(grep -m 1 -oP '^laddr = "\K[^"]+' "$HOME/.safrochain/config/config.toml" | cut -d ':' -f 3)

# Colors
RED='\033[1;31m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
BLUE='\033[1;34m'
CYAN='\033[1;36m'
GREEN='\033[1;32m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

while true; do
  # Local node height
  local_height=$(curl -s localhost:$rpc_port/status 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.result.sync_info.latest_block_height')
  
  # Network height (LinkNode RPC)
  network_height=$(curl -s https://safrochain-testnet-rpc.linknode.org/status 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.result.sync_info.latest_block_height')
  
  # Error check
  if ! [[ "$local_height" =~ ^[0-9]+$ ]] || ! [[ "$network_height" =~ ^[0-9]+$ ]]; then
    echo -e "${RED}Error: Invalid block height data. Retrying...${NC}"
    sleep 5
    continue
  fi
  
  # Calculate remaining blocks
  blocks_left=$((network_height - local_height))
  
  # Sync status
  if [ "$blocks_left" -eq 0 ]; then
    sync_status="${GREEN}SYNCED${NC}"
  else
    sync_status="${YELLOW}SYNCING${NC}"
  fi
  
  # Show status
  echo -e "${YELLOW}Node Height:${BLUE} $local_height${NC} | ${YELLOW}Network Height:${CYAN} $network_height${NC} | ${YELLOW}Blocks Left:${RED} $blocks_left${NC} | Status: $sync_status"
  
  sleep 5
done
EOF

# Make script executable
chmod +x ~/safro_sync_check.sh

# Run
~/safro_sync_check.sh
```

The script updates every 5 seconds and shows you:
- Node height
- Network height
- Remaining blocks
- Sync status (SYNCED/SYNCING)

Use `CTRL+C` to stop.

### Other Useful Commands

```bash
# Sync status (one-time)
safrochaind status 2>&1 | jq .sync_info

# Node ID
safrochaind tendermint show-node-id

# Validator info
safrochaind tendermint show-validator

# Peer count
curl -s localhost:${PORT_PREFIX}657/net_info | jq .result.n_peers

# Connected peers
curl -s localhost:${PORT_PREFIX}657/net_info | jq -r '.result.peers[] | "\(.node_info.id)@\(.remote_ip):\(.node_info.listen_addr)"' | awk -F ':' '{print $1":"$(NF)}'
```

## üìù Useful Commands

### Alias Setup (For Easy Use)

```bash
# Create alias
echo 'alias safrochaind="LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/root/safrochain-node/lib /root/go/bin/safrochaind"' >> ~/.bashrc
source ~/.bashrc

# Now you can use directly:
safrochaind version
safrochaind status
```

### Log Management

```bash
# Last 100 lines
journalctl -u safrochaind -n 100 --no-pager

# Live log monitoring
journalctl -fu safrochaind -o cat

# Error logs
journalctl -u safrochaind --no-pager | grep -i error
```

### Service Control

```bash
# Stop
sudo systemctl stop safrochaind

# Start
sudo systemctl start safrochaind

# Restart
sudo systemctl restart safrochaind

# Status
sudo systemctl status safrochaind
```

## üõ†Ô∏è Troubleshooting

### Problem: Binary Shows "libwasmvm" Error

```bash
# Check libwasmvm
ldd ~/go/bin/safrochaind | grep wasmvm

# If you see a different path (e.g., /root/.lumera/lib/)
# Binary is using another node's libwasmvm

# Solution: Manual test
cd ~/safrochain-node
LD_LIBRARY_PATH=./lib ~/go/bin/safrochaind version
# Should show v0.1.0
```

### Problem: Wrapper Script Not Working

Check if the wrapper script has segmentation fault:

```bash
# Check wrapper
cat $HOME/.safrochain/cosmovisor/genesis/bin/safrochaind

# Important: Do NOT use exec!
# WRONG:
# exec /root/go/bin/safrochaind "$@"

# CORRECT:
# LD_LIBRARY_PATH=./lib /root/go/bin/safrochaind "$@"

# Fix wrapper
rm $HOME/.safrochain/cosmovisor/genesis/bin/safrochaind
cat > $HOME/.safrochain/cosmovisor/genesis/bin/safrochaind << 'EOF'
#!/bin/bash
cd /root/safrochain-node
LD_LIBRARY_PATH=./lib /root/go/bin/safrochaind "$@"
EOF

chmod +x $HOME/.safrochain/cosmovisor/genesis/bin/safrochaind

# Test
$HOME/.safrochain/cosmovisor/genesis/bin/safrochaind version
# Should show v0.1.0
```

### Problem: Port Already in Use

```bash
# Which process is using the port?
sudo lsof -i:${PORT_PREFIX}656

# Kill all safrochain processes
sudo pkill -f safrochaind

# Restart service
sudo systemctl restart safrochaind
```

### Alternative: Direct Service Without Cosmovisor

If you're having issues with Cosmovisor:

```bash
# Stop Cosmovisor service
sudo systemctl stop safrochaind
sudo systemctl disable safrochaind

# Create direct service
sudo tee /etc/systemd/system/safrochaind.service > /dev/null <<EOF
[Unit]
Description=Safrochain Node (Direct)
After=network-online.target

[Service]
User=root
WorkingDirectory=/root/safrochain-node
Environment="LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/root/safrochain-node/lib"
ExecStart=/root/go/bin/safrochaind start
Restart=on-failure
RestartSec=10
LimitNOFILE=65535

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF

# Start
sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo systemctl enable safrochaind
sudo systemctl start safrochaind
```

### Sync Issues

```bash
# Update addrbook
wget -O $HOME/.safrochain/config/addrbook.json https://vault2.astrostake.xyz/testnet/safrochain/addrbook.json
sudo systemctl restart safrochaind

# Reset node (last resort)
sudo systemctl stop safrochaind
safrochaind tendermint unsafe-reset-all --home $HOME/.safrochain --keep-addr-book
sudo systemctl start safrochaind
```

## üóëÔ∏è Complete Node Removal

```bash
# Stop and remove service
sudo systemctl stop safrochaind
sudo systemctl disable safrochaind
sudo rm -f /etc/systemd/system/safrochaind.service
sudo systemctl daemon-reload

# Remove Safrochain files
rm -rf ~/.safrochain
rm -rf ~/safrochain-node
rm -f ~/go/bin/safrochaind

# Remove alias
sed -i '/safrochaind/d' ~/.bashrc

# Clean variables
sed -i '/MONIKER/d' ~/.bash_profile
sed -i '/WALLET_NAME/d' ~/.bash_profile
sed -i '/PORT_PREFIX/d' ~/.bash_profile
sed -i '/SAFROCHAIN/d' ~/.bash_profile

# Reload bash
source ~/.bashrc
source ~/.bash_profile

echo "‚úÖ Safrochain completely removed!"
```

## ‚ö†Ô∏è Critical Notes

1. **Go Version**: Definitely use Go 1.23.9
2. **libwasmvm**: Use ONLY v2.0.1 (v2.2.4 or v1.x DO NOT WORK!)
3. **Wrapper Script**: MANDATORY for Cosmovisor (don't use exec!)
4. **LD_LIBRARY_PATH**: Should always point to `/root/safrochain-node/lib`
5. **Binary Location**: Actual binary is `/root/go/bin/safrochaind`
6. **Wrapper Location**: `/root/.safrochain/cosmovisor/genesis/bin/safrochaind`
7. **Port Conflicts**: You may get "port already in use" error at first, it fixes after service restarts a few times
